isis.stitle: TSI 04-12-13 - Oil Level Gauge Adapter Service Kit

subjectgroup.subject: Oil Level Gauge Adapter Service Kit

geninfo.para: A new service kit is available to eliminate oil leaks occurring at the oil level gauge adapter on the oil pan.

para.emph: Service technicians can now repair oil leaks without removing the oil pan.

partsinfo.para: The Oil Level Gauge Adapter Kit part number is 1846146C91 and includes the following:

item.para: O-ring seal (oil level gauge adapter tube assembly)

partsinfo.para: Contact your International® Service Parts supplier to order the new service kit.
